name: eslint-test-spruce
description: Tests for the Spruce Lint packages

scripts.test.fail: cd lint-samples/; for d in fail-*; do echo Trying $d - expecting errors ; eslint $d; if [ $? -ne 1 ]; then echo FAILED: $d; exit 1; fi; echo ğŸ‘; done
scripts.test.pass: cd lint-samples/; for d in pass-*; do echo Trying $d - expecting success; eslint $d; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo FAILED: $d; exit 1; fi; echo ğŸ‘; done
